response.overview: On his first day on the job as a narcotics officer, a rookie cop works with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears.
response.tagline: The only thing more dangerous than the line being crossed, is the cop who will cross it.
response.title: Training Day

titles.title: ตำรวจระห่ำ ... คดไม่เป็น

results.name: Denzel Washington Wins Best Actor | 74th Oscars (2002)
